ModMetaData.name: Art Reroll
ModMetaData.author: pipai
ModMetaData.description:
Reroll art descriptions.
Hate that the art for your new masterwork has nothing to do with your colony? Reroll your art!
Three buttons available: - Random reroll (Completely random) - Specific reroll based on a situation (TaleDefs to be exact) - Specific reroll based on a colonist
Note on the Specific Reroll buttons: The vanilla TaleTextGenerator has a 20% chance to generate non-tale-related text despite picking a relevant tale. I cannot control this without unduly hacking too much into vanilla behavior, which would be bad for compatibility reasons. Instead, just reroll again and see what you get.
This mod should be compatible with any other mods that add tales, as it reads from the TaleDef database.
Github link: https://github.com/cypai/ArtReroll
